FuncDef:
The statistic enable command enables IPv4 and IPv6 traffic statistics on the main interface.
The undo statistic enable command disables IPv4/IPv6 traffic statistics on the main interface.

By default, IPv4 and IPv6 traffic statistics on the main interface are disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario

After a device is enabled to send IP statistics on a physical interface, the interface collects IPv4 and IPv6 traffic statistics separately and sends them to the NMS.

Implementation Procedure

Enable IP statistics on a physical interface.

Configuration Impact

After a device is enabled to send IP statistics on a physical interface, the device applies statistics resources for the interface.
After a device is disabled from sending IP statistics on a physical interface, the device releases statistics resources on the interface.

Precautions

After running the statistic enable command, you have to run the statistic mode forward command to allow the dual-stack traffic statistics collection function to take effect.
